posts.post_content:
Price includes shipping, signature confirmation and insurance and assumes a no-fee payment method.  PP Goods plus 3.5% is fine too.

Really nice card for the grade.  There are a couple tiny wrinkles and a little crease on the bottom of the card.  Hard to see on the front, but more visible on the back right at the bottom edge.

$2185....DROP TO $2085......Drop to $2000 SOLD
